Summary: it was like i cylinder shape that i saw i was so amazed
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Lakewood
There were no other sightings in Lakewood on or around April 10th 2005
divs: Sighting Detailsit was a late 7:00 when i looked outside i love the solar system so i was looking at the beautiful stars, then out of the corner of my eye i saw something it was cylinder shape hovering.I told my family to come look, and i got a piece of paper and pencil and started drawing i looked at it,it seemed to stop if it was a plain it would have fell out of the sky.It all of the sudden shot up like, miles and miles away it soon got so far away i couldnt see it any more. I rember it was a grey leadish color it had lights that were light blue,it could alomost be white. I can rember it like it was yesterday.I still have the drawing.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
